Title: 193: A serious talk on AI taking over jobs
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Artificial Intelligence expert, Roman Yampolskiy. You will hear about Artificial Intelligence safety, hear how AI is going to quickly take over in the coming years and why we have to prioritize AI safety for safer machines, and also get valuable advice on how to start a career in AI, for business owners, and for professionals on how to get to high-end jobs.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/193
